Articles.Content:
Just what the title says. I want to make a mod that has something to do with MKS/OKS, or just space stations or colonies in general. How do I get started?

I do think I know what I need. Something called Blender, and a programming tool. I need help taking off from there.

It depends what exactly you want to do.

Do you want to add existing functionality to existing parts? All you need is Notepad.

Do you want to retexture existing models? All you need is an image editor.

Do you want to make new parts? You'll need a 3D package (Blender is a great choice) and the free Untiy toolset, along with an image editor for making the textures.

Do you want to make new functionality in code? You'll need a C# compiler, if on Windows Visual Studio Express is a good free choice, if not MonoDevelop is good.
